interpretation: The "shower" card represents a moment of cleansing and renewal. This could signify a physical shower, but also metaphorical cleansing of the mind or spirit. It is a reminder to let go of any negativity or impurities, and embrace a fresh start. This card may indicate a need for self-care or a new beginning in a relationship or situation. Associated keywords include: cleansing, renewal, refreshment, self-care, starting anew, letting go.
